VW MASTERCAR DEALER : 80 Point Mechanical Check. AA Roadworthy Tested and accident free. We accept trade-ins. We arrange finance. Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R3990, Lic /Reg of R850 , Numberplates of R350, Delivery fee (price dependent on distance) and optional value added products. All sales subject to balance of Factory warranty or warranty purchase.

The KWID’s design strategy symbolizes dynamic performance, robust strength and a taste for adventure. Go ahead, make the most of every day. 

Contact us today. We deliver country wide, metallic color, licensing and Service & delivery fees are not included.
FREE INSURANCE FOR ONE YEAR.
